Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.answers.worker

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildMessage
    BuildMessage class is an Answer used for sending infos about a build action to the client.
    DoubleMoveMessage
    DoubleMoveMessage class is an Answer used for sending information about a double move action to the client.
    LoseMessage
    LoseMessage class is an Answer used for sending the message "YOU LOSE" to a specific player.
    MoveMessage
    MoveMessage class is an Answer used for sending infos about a move action to the client.
    PlayerLostMessage
    PlayerLostMessage class is an Answer used for sending the loser to all players.
    SelectSpacesMessage
    SelectSpacesMessage class is an Answer used for sending selectable spaces to the client.
    WinMessage
    WinMessage class is an Answer used for sending win message to all players.
